Raheem Sterling is a speedy forward who plays for England and Chelsea, after moving from Manchester City in the summer of 2022. While at the Etihad, Sterling won four Premier League titles and was a runner-up in the Champions League in 2021. He won a full England cap at 17 - making him England's fifth youngest international ever at the time - and was a pivotal figure for England at the 2018 World Cup and Euro 2020.
